name: Unity Web Player Archive
summary: A UNITY3D file is an archive that contains a 3D game meant to be played in the Unity Web Player. It stores all the game's assets, including its models, textures, animations, sounds, and other game data, in a proprietary, closed format. The Unity Web Player is discontinued, so you may no longer be able to play the game a UNITY3D file contains.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
